properties.name: io.sapl.node.allowNoAuth
properties.description: If set to true, access to all API end points is permitted without authentication.

properties.name: io.sapl.node.rejectOnMissingPdpId
properties.description: If true, reject authentication when pdpId is missing. If false, use defaultPdpId.

properties.name: io.sapl.node.defaultPdpId
properties.description: Default PDP ID used when pdpId is not configured or missing from JWT claim.

properties.name: io.sapl.node.users
properties.description: List of user entries with id, pdpId, and credentials (basic or apiKey).

properties.name: io.sapl.node.oauth.pdpIdClaim
properties.description: JWT claim name containing the PDP ID for OAuth2 authentication.

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.embedded.pdp-config-type
properties.description: Select file system or bundled resources.

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.embedded.print-text-report
properties.description: This flag turns on a textual report in the logs for each decision made.

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.embedded.print-trace
properties.description: This flag turns on a detailed JSON trace in the logs for each decision made.

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.embedded.pretty-print-reports
properties.description: This flag turns on pretty printing of JSON object in report and trace logging.

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.embedded.print-json-report
properties.description: This flag turns on a JSON report in the logs for each decision made.

properties.name: loader.path
properties.description: Comma separated list of paths to load additional JARs from.
